title: Class of '83
short_cast: Bobby Deol, Bhupendra Jadawat, Hitesh Bhojraj, Anup Soni, Joy Sengupta, Sameer Paranjape, Ninad Mahajani, Prithvik Pratap
cast: Bobby Deol, Bhupendra Jadawat, Hitesh Bhojraj, Anup Soni, Joy Sengupta, Sameer Paranjape, Ninad Mahajani, Prithvik Pratap
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Bollywood Movies, Crime Movies, Dramas, Thriller Movies

desc: Demoted to an academy job, a cop trains five foolhardy students as assassins in his risky revenge plot against police corruption and the underworld.
